mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nvlinktrace (campaign_no, link_seq, link_url, link_desc, link_title) VALUES (#{no}, #{linkSeq}, #{linkUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO nvlinktrace (campaign_no, link_seq, link_url, link_desc, link_title) SELECT #{newCampaignNo}, link_seq, link_url, link_desc, link_title FROM nvlinktrace WHERE campaign_no = #{campaignNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT campaign_no, max(link_url) as link_url, max(link_title) as link_title, sum(link_cnt) as linktrace_cnt , sum(unique_link_cnt) as unique_link_cnt, sum(all_link_cnt) as all_link_cnt, sum(best_link_cnt) as best_link_cnt FROM ( SELECT a.campaign_no, '' as link_url, '' as link_title, count(a.link_seq) as link_cnt , sum(b.unique_link_cnt) as unique_link_cnt, sum(b.all_link_cnt) as all_link_cnt, 0 as best_link_cnt FROM nvlinktrace a, ( SELECT campaign_no, link_seq, sum(link_cnt) as unique_link_cnt, sum(link_ocnt) as all_link_cnt FROM nvrptlink WHERE campaign_no IN (#{campaignNo}) GROUP BY campaign_no, link_seq ) b WHERE a.campaign_no = b.campaign_no AND a.link_seq = b.link_seq AND a.campaign_no IN (#{campaignNo}) GROUP BY a.campaign_no
UNION ALL SELECT a.campaign_no, a.link_url, a.link_title, 0 as link_cnt, 0 as unique_link_cnt , 0 as all_link_cnt, b.best_link_cnt FROM nvlinktrace a, ( SELECT campaign_no, cast(right(rk, 7) as int) link_seq, cast(left(rk, 7) as int) best_link_cnt FROM ( SELECT campaign_no, max(right(cast(link_seq + 10000000 as char(8)), 7) + '|' + right(cast(link_seq + 10000000 as char(8)), 7)) rk FROM nvrptlink GROUP BY campaign_no ) c ) b WHERE a.campaign_no = b.campaign_no AND a.link_seq = b.link_seq AND b.campaign_no IN (#{campaignNo}) ) x GROUP BY campaign_no ORDER BY campaign_no DESC

SELECT y.no, CASE y.no WHEN 2 THEN 'Total' ELSE link_url END link_url , max(x.link_seq) link_seq, max(x.link_desc) link_desc, max(x.link_url) link_url, max(x.link_title) link_title , coalesce(sum(cnt),0) total_cnt, coalesce(count(one_click_cnt),0) one_click_cnt, coalesce(count(more_click_cnt),0) more_click_cnt , CASE y.no WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END gid FROM ( SELECT a.link_seq, b.customer_id, max(a.link_desc) link_desc, max(a.link_url) link_url, max(a.link_title) link_title, count(*) cnt , CASE WHEN count(*) >= 1 THEN 1 END one_click_cnt, CASE WHEN count(*) > 1 THEN 1 END more_click_cnt FROM nvlinktrace a, nvlinkresult b, nvsendresult c WHERE a.campaign_no = b.campaign_no AND a.link_seq = b.link_seq AND b.result_seq = c.result_seq AND a.campaign_no = #{campaignNo} AND (c.resend_sts IS NULL OR c.resend_sts = 'F') GROUP BY a.link_seq, b.customer_id ) x, ( SELECT no FROM copy_t WHERE no <= 2 ) y GROUP BY y.no, CASE y.no WHEN 2 THEN 'Total' ELSE link_url END ORDER BY gid

SELECT coalesce(count(one_click_cnt),0) one_click_cnt, coalesce(count(more_click_cnt),0) more_click_cnt FROM ( SELECT a.link_seq, b.customer_id , CASE WHEN count(*) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END one_click_cnt , CASE WHEN count(*) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END more_click_cnt FROM nvlinktrace a, nvlinkresult b, nvsendresult c WHERE a.campaign_no = b.campaign_no AND a.link_seq = b.link_seq AND b.result_seq = c.result_seq AND a.campaign_no = #{campaignNo} AND (c.resend_sts IS NULL OR c.resend_sts = 'F') GROUP BY a.link_seq, b.customer_id ) x
